statements: UPDATE employee_authentication SET fingerprint_scan = 'updated fingerprint' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE access_logs SET success = TRUE, scan_datetime = '2022-03-05 08:30:00' WHERE log_id = 10;

UPDATE departments SET dept_name='Engineering' WHERE dept_id=2;
UPDATE employees SET name = 'John Doe', fingerprint_scan = <BLOB_DATA> WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE departments SET dept_name = 'HR' WHERE dept_id = 201;
UPDATE employee_auth SET fingerprint_scan = ? WHERE id = ?
UPDATE employee_roles SET role_name = ?, role_description = ? WHERE employee_id = ?
